Method Detail

locate

public IAeFunctionContext locate(java.lang.String aNamespace,
                                 java.lang.String aLocation,
                                 java.lang.String aClassName)
                          throws AeInvalidFunctionContextException
If no location (empty string or null) has been specified, the context class is loaded via the default class loader. Otherwise, the location is taken to be one or more absolute file paths separated by a semi-colon (;). The location string will be used to create a URLClassLoader with the default class loader set as its parent. This new class loader will be used to find the IAeExpressionFunctionContext class.

Specified by:
locate in interface IAeFunctionContextLocator
Parameters:
aNamespace -
aLocation -
aClassName -
Throws:
AeInvalidFunctionContextException

Parameters:

getDefaultClassLoader

protected java.lang.ClassLoader getDefaultClassLoader()
Accessor for the default ClassLoader used to resolve FunctionContext impls. If no default ClassLoader has been explicitly set then the context class loader for the current thread is returned.
